items.title: With a default active state specified
Actions, Table actions and Bulk actions
Actions with Data view toggle enabled
Customizing number of Cards shown per row

props.name: column
props.docblock:
Specifies a column object.

`setFilter`: Function to set the filter value.

`Header`: Column header used for labels and placeholders.

`getHeaderProps`: Generates a key unique to the column being filtered.

`filterValue`: Value for the filter input.

description.text:
Specifies a column object.

`setFilter`: Function to set the filter value.

`Header`: Column header used for labels and placeholders.

`getHeaderProps`: Generates a key unique to the column being filtered.

`filterValue`: Value for the filter input.

props.name: className
props.docblock: A class name to append to the base element

description.text: A class name to append to the base element

props.name: clearSelectionText
props.docblock: A text that appears on the `Clear selection` button, defaults to 'Clear Selection'

description.text: A text that appears on the `Clear selection` button, defaults to 'Clear Selection'

props.name: getHeaderProps
props.docblock: Returns props for the th element

description.text: Returns props for the th element

props.name: isSorted
props.docblock: Indicates whether or not a column is sorted

description.text: Indicates whether or not a column is sorted

props.name: render
props.docblock: Renders the header content. Passed the string 'Header'

description.text: Renders the header content. Passed the string 'Header'

props.name: isSortedDesc
props.docblock: Indicates whether the column is sorted in descending order

getHeaderGroupProps.name: func
getHeaderGroupProps.description: Returns props for the header tr element

props.name: row

getRowProps.name: func
getRowProps.description: props to include on the tr tag (must include id)

isSelected.name: bool
isSelected.description: indicates if row has been selected

isExpanded.name: bool
isExpanded.description: Indicates if row has been expanded.

props.docblock: Row data that is received from `react-table` API.

description.text: Row data that is received from `react-table` API.

props.name: columns

accessor.name: custom
accessor.description: String used to access the correct cell data for this column

Cell.name: union
Cell.description: Specifies a function that receives `row` as argument and returns cell content

props.docblock: Definition of table columns

description.text: Definition of table columns

props.name: data
props.docblock: Data to be displayed in the table

description.text: Data to be displayed in the table

props.name: isSelectable
props.docblock: table rows can be selected

description.text: table rows can be selected

props.name: manualSelectColumn
props.docblock: Alternate column for selecting rows. See react table useSort docs for more information

description.text: Alternate column for selecting rows. See react table useSort docs for more information

props.name: isSortable
props.docblock: Table columns can be sorted

description.text: Table columns can be sorted

props.name: manualSortBy
props.docblock: Indicates that sorting will be done via backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

description.text: Indicates that sorting will be done via backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

props.name: isPaginated
props.docblock: Paginate the table

description.text: Paginate the table

props.name: manualPagination
props.docblock: Indicates that pagination will be done manually. A fetchData function must be provided

description.text: Indicates that pagination will be done manually. A fetchData function must be provided

props.name: isFilterable
props.docblock: Table rows can be filtered, using a default filter in the default column values, or in the column definition

description.text: Table rows can be filtered, using a default filter in the default column values, or in the column definition

props.name: manualFilters
props.docblock: Indicates that filtering will be done via a backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

description.text: Indicates that filtering will be done via a backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

props.name: defaultColumnValues

Filter.name: union
Filter.description: A default filter component for the column

props.docblock: defaults that will be set on each column. Will be overridden by individual column values

description.text: defaults that will be set on each column. Will be overridden by individual column values

props.name: additionalColumns

id.name: string
id.description: id must be unique from other columns ids

Header.name: union
Header.description: column header that will be displayed to the user

Cell.name: union
Cell.description: Component that renders in the added column. It will receive the row as a prop

props.docblock: Actions or other additional non-data columns can be added here

description.text: Actions or other additional non-data columns can be added here

props.name: fetchData
props.docblock:
Function that will fetch table data. Called when page size, page index or filters change.
Meant to be used with manual filters and pagination

description.text:
Function that will fetch table data. Called when page size, page index or filters change.
Meant to be used with manual filters and pagination

props.name: initialState
props.docblock: Initial state passed to react-table's documentation https://react-table.tanstack.com/docs/api/useTable

description.text: Initial state passed to react-table's documentation https://react-table.tanstack.com/docs/api/useTable

props.name: initialTableOptions
props.docblock:
Table options passed to react-table's useTable hook. Will override some options passed in to DataTable, such
     as: data, columns, defaultColumn, manualFilters, manualPagination, manualSortBy, and initialState

description.text:
Table options passed to react-table's useTable hook. Will override some options passed in to DataTable, such
     as: data, columns, defaultColumn, manualFilters, manualPagination, manualSortBy, and initialState

props.name: itemCount
props.docblock: Actions to be performed on the table. Called with the table instance. Not displayed if rows are selected.

description.text: Actions to be performed on the table. Called with the table instance. Not displayed if rows are selected.

props.name: bulkActions

handleClick.name: func
handleClick.description: handleClick will be passed the selected rows

variant.name: string
variant.description: optional button variant; only relevant for the first two buttons

value.name: func
value.description: function passed selected items, should return action object

value.name: element
value.description: A custom component representing an action

value.name: element
value.description: A custom component representing an action

props.docblock:
Actions to be performed on selected rows of the table. Called with the selected rows.
 Only displayed if rows are selected.

description.text:
Actions to be performed on selected rows of the table. Called with the selected rows.
 Only displayed if rows are selected.

props.name: tableActions

handleClick.name: func
handleClick.description: handleClick will be passed the selected rows

variant.name: string
variant.description: optional button variant; only relevant for the first two buttons

value.name: func
value.description: function passed table instance, should return action object

value.description: A custom component representing an action

value.description: A custom component representing an action

props.docblock: Function for rendering custom components, called with the table instance

description.text: Function for rendering custom components, called with the table instance

props.name: numBreakoutFilters
props.docblock: Number between one and four filters that can be shown on the top row.

description.text: Number between one and four filters that can be shown on the top row.

props.name: EmptyTableComponent
props.docblock: Component to be displayed when the table is empty

description.text: Component to be displayed when the table is empty

props.name: RowStatusComponent
props.docblock: Component to be displayed for row status, ie, 10 of 20 rows. Displayed by default in the TableControlBar

description.text: Component to be displayed for row status, ie, 10 of 20 rows. Displayed by default in the TableControlBar

props.name: SelectionStatusComponent
props.docblock: Component to be displayed for selection status. Displayed when there are selected rows and no active filters

description.text: Component to be displayed for selection status. Displayed when there are selected rows and no active filters

props.name: FilterStatusComponent
props.docblock: Component to be displayed for filter status. Displayed when there are active filters.

description.text: Component to be displayed for filter status. Displayed when there are active filters.

props.name: children
props.docblock: If children are not provided a table with control bar and footer will be rendered

description.text: If children are not provided a table with control bar and footer will be rendered

props.name: showFiltersInSidebar
props.docblock: If true filters will be shown on sidebar instead

description.text: If true filters will be shown on sidebar instead

props.name: dataViewToggleOptions

isDataViewToggleEnabled.name: bool
isDataViewToggleEnabled.description: Whether to show a toggle button group which allows view switching between card and table views

onDataViewToggle.name: func
onDataViewToggle.description: Callback invoked when the toggle buttons are clicked, with value of selected button passed in

defaultActiveStateValue.name: string
defaultActiveStateValue.description: default value for toggle active state

togglePlacement.name: string
togglePlacement.description:
placement of toggle 'bottom' will push it to the bottom row in
actions section. Only 'left' and 'bottom' are supported

props.docblock: options for data view toggle

description.text: options for data view toggle

props.name: disableElevation
props.docblock: Remove the default box shadow on the component

description.text: Remove the default box shadow on the component

props.name: renderRowSubComponent
props.docblock: A function that will render contents of expanded row, accepts `row` as a prop.

description.text: A function that will render contents of expanded row, accepts `row` as a prop.

props.name: isExpandable
props.docblock: Indicates whether table supports expandable rows.

description.text: Indicates whether table supports expandable rows.

props.name: isLoading
props.docblock: Indicates whether the table should show loading states.

description.text: Indicates whether the table should show loading states.

props.name: onSelectedRowsChanged
props.docblock: Callback function called when row selections change.

description.text: Callback function called when row selections change.

props.name: maxSelectedRows
props.docblock: Indicates the max of rows selectable in the table. Requires isSelectable prop

description.text: Indicates the max of rows selectable in the table. Requires isSelectable prop

props.name: onMaxSelectedRows
props.docblock: Callback after selected max rows. Requires isSelectable and maxSelectedRows props

An object containing the desired column size at each breakpoint, following a similar

props.name: CardComponent
props.docblock:
Your card component must be individualized to your table.
It will be called with props from the "row" of data it will display

Your card component must be individualized to your table.
